title: ProfileHeader
description: It is used to give quick information of a contact in the header and access to the various methods of communicating with a contact.

Visible.description: Set the visibility of this control.

DataSubscriptions.description: Array of data change events to subscribe to.

Description.description: Description text displayed on the cell.

DetailImage.description: Image to be displayed for the Profile. Supports rendering of both locally saved images and images from Web (https only).

DetailImageIsCircular.description: If the value is True, the image is displayed in a circular shape.

ActivityItems.description:
Activity items to be displayed in the control.

For iOS devices, a defined iOS app is used on the client app for video calls when you set the VideoCall parameter.

For Android devices, thereâ€™s no standard app that is used for a video call on the client app when you set the VideoCall parameter.

Description.description: The string value is a style class name of `Description`.

Headline.description: The string value is a style class name of `Headline`.

Subheadline.description: The string value is a style class name of `Subheadline`.

BackgroundColor.description: The string value is a style class name of `BackgroundColor`.

DetailImage.description: The string value is a style class name of `Image`. The CSS property `background-color` is supported for all image types, while `font-size` and `color` are additionally supported for SAP icon and font icon types.

Styles.description: A style to be applied to the Profile Header.

Target.description: Only the first record of any entity set returned by the target will be used.
